title: Luca's Bad Girl
description: Welcome to the world of Sydney Harbor Hospital (or SHH…for short—because secrets never stay hidden for long!)One night in the on-call room can never be enough for this couple!Regular lovemaking is Dr. Luca DiAngelo's preferred antidote to stress. But even he is surprised by the passion a brush with danger inspires in prickly E.R. doctor Mia McKenzie.Vulnerable Mia is furious she slept with the devilishly charming Sicilian and she's determined to give her hot lover the cold shoulder. But the chemistry that blazes between them might just melt the hardest of hearts….
author: Amy Andrews
